                                                Composite candidate,
                                                CellNameType comparator)
        finds the max cell name component(s) Note that this method *can modify maxSeen*.
        Parameters:
        maxSeen - the max columns seen so far
        candidate - the candidate column(s)
        comparator - the comparator to use
        Returns:
        a list with the max column(s)
